archimate:Goal.name: Scope, method, SLA, roles and responsibilities for Vulnerability Management defined
archimate:Goal.documentation:
ensure that new threats and vulnerabilities are automatically included in scans and shown in scan reports need to ensure that the services support collection of pipeline specific log data that can be used as input to developers as a way of feedback and troubleshooting
ensure that the services support a management interface that gives Devs and Ops the ability to get access to pipeline specific logdata.
We need a service that support Realtime scanning and reporting
